title: Development plan finished
content: Our plan on how we approach this project is finished, and we are already thinking about all the features we want to implement. Is there anything you definitely want to see in the App? Hit us up via devs@episko.com, tell us about your idea, and we will try to realize it.
author: DosKobold

title: Planning done - Now start doing
content: Today we finished the last part of the planning phase. This means everything is set up, and we can finally start implementing. For those of you who are interested in this part of the process, feel free to check out our GitHub page (github.com/SoftwareEngineeringOne/episko).
author: BenOeckl

title: Progress
content: We are working hard on the last features. If everything goes as planned, we're looking forward to releasing the beta version by the end of the month. See you there. :D
author: BenOeckl
